Question
========

Ten observations have a mean of 30 and a standard deviation of 8. If we multiply each of the observations by 2 and then add 5 to the result then add another 5, the standard deviation of the new numbers is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 13
* 16
* 21
* 65

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 13: Incorrect
* 16: Correct
* 21: Incorrect
* 65: Incorrect
